description: Metrics defined in libp2p-gossipsub. These are collected once the emulation finished.

panels.description: Status of our subscription to this topic.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name" as "name", "instance_peer_id" as "peer_id", "hash" as "topic", "status" FROM "topic_subscription_status"  WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}'

panels.title: topic_subscription_status

panels.description: Number of peers subscribed to each topic.

targets.query: SELECT "count", "instance_name" FROM "topic_peers_counts" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_peers_counts (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: The number of invalid messages received for a given topic.

targets.query: SELECT instance_name, count FROM "invalid_messages_per_topic" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: invalid_messages_per_topic (topic: ${topic:text})

panels.description: The number of messages accepted by the application (validation result).

targets.query: SELECT instance_name, count FROM "accepted_messages_per_topic" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: accepted_messages_per_topic (topic: ${topic:text})

panels.description: The number of messages ignored by the application (validation result).

targets.query: SELECT instance_name, count FROM "ignored_messages_per_topic" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: ignored_messages_per_topic (topic: ${topic:text})

panels.description: The number of messages rejected by the application (validation result).

targets.query: SELECT instance_name, count FROM "rejected_messages_per_topic" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: rejected_messages_per_topic (topic: ${topic:text})

panels.description: Number of times we include peers in a topic mesh for different reasons.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name" AS "name", "instance_peer_id" AS "peer_id", "reason",  "count" FROM "mesh_peer_inclusion_events" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: mesh_peer_inclusion_events  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Number of times we remove peers in a topic mesh for different reasons.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name" AS "name", "instance_peer_id" AS "peer_id", "reason", "count" FROM "mesh_peer_churn_events" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: mesh_peer_churn_events  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Number of peers in our mesh.

targets.query: SELECT "count", "instance_name" FROM "mesh_peer_counts" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: mesh_peer_counts (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Number of gossip messages sent to each topic.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name", "count" FROM "topic_msg_sent_counts" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_msg_sent_counts  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Bytes from gossip messages sent to each topic.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name", "count" FROM "topic_msg_sent_bytes" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_msg_sent_bytes  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Number of gossipsub messages published to each topic.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name", "count" FROM "topic_msg_published" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_msg_published  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Number of gossipsub messages received on each topic (after filtering duplicates).

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name", "count" FROM "topic_msg_recv_counts" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_msg_recv_counts  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Number of gossipsub messages received on each topic (without filtering duplicates).

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name", "count" FROM "topic_msg_recv_counts_unfiltered" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_msg_recv_counts_unfiltered  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Bytes received from gossip messages for each topic.

targets.query: SELECT "instance_name", "count" FROM "topic_msg_recv_bytes" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_msg_recv_bytes  (topic: ${topic})

panels.description: Histogram of the scores for each mesh topic.

targets.query: SELECT count AS "mesh", upper_bound FROM "score_per_mesh" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}' AND "instance_name" = '${instance_name}'

panels.title: score_per_mesh histogram (topic: ${topic}, instance: ${instance_name})

panels.description: A counter of the kind of penalties being applied to peers.

targets.query: SELECT instance_name AS "name", instance_peer_id AS "peer_id", penalty, count FROM "scoring_penalties" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}'

panels.title: scoring_penalties

panels.description: The number of peers that are connected to each protocol.

targets.query: SELECT instance_name AS "name", peers FROM "peers_per_protocol" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND protocol = '${protocol:text}'

panels.title: peers_per_protocol (protocol: ${protocol})

panels.description: The time it takes to complete one iteration of the heartbeat.

targets.query: SELECT upper_bound, count FROM "heartbeat_duration" WHERE run_id = '${run_id:text}' AND instance_name = '${instance_name:text}'

panels.title: heartbeat_duration histogram (instance: ${instance_name})

targets.query: SELECT instance_name AS "name", count FROM "memcache_misses" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}'

panels.description: The number of times we have decided that an IWANT control message is required for this topic.

targets.query: SELECT instance_name, count FROM "topic_iwant_msgs" WHERE "run_id" = '${run_id:text}' AND "hash" = '${topic:text}'

panels.title: topic_iwant_msgs (topic: ${topic:text})

title: Gossipsub metrics
